cmp: 巴 ((suff. for certain nouns)/to hope/to wish/Palestinian, Palestine (abbrev.)/Pakistan (abbrev.)/Pascal (unit of pressure))

exm.mng: scar, fig. remnant of former damage, remaining trauma
to form a scar, to form a scab
to forget past pains once the wound has healed (idiom)
exm.pyn: hǎo le shāng bā wàng le téng
